summary:
Ever thought to yourself, \'\'I would really enjoy living in a ruined house inside a cave, surrounded by all of my favourite alchemy ingredients.\'\'? 

Strangely enough, i did... and a few moments later this mod was born. 


I welcome you to Greenburrow!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/45741-1-1382942479.jpg[/img]

Ever thought to yourself, \'\'I would really enjoy living in a ruined house inside a cave, surrounded by all of my favourite alchemy ingredients.\'\'? 

Strangely enough, i did... and a few moments later this mod was born. 


I welcome you to Greenburrow! 



FEATURES: 

- A plethora and a half of alchemy plants (at least 2 of every kind). 
- A fully functional forge area, complete with tanner, workbench, grindstone and smelter. 
- Wood chopping block. 
- Cooking pot. 
- Bed. 
- A chest. 
- An enchanter. 
- Some barrels. 
- Another chest. 
- A pool (w/ waterfall) 
- Senic decor 
- A third chest. 
- A few trees. 
- And of course, an alchemy lab. 

But wait! Theres more! 
- One single Jarrin Root plant. :D 



LOCATION: 

Extremely clost to the Falkreath fast travel point. Its tucked behind a rock, so its a little bit out of sight, but im pretty sure that you will find it okay. 



OTHER NOTES 

-This house is FULLY NAVEMESHED (kinda)! If you get bugs with the Navemeshing, it\'s because I suck at doing it. :/ 

- if it seems kinda hastily finished, it\'s because it is. I\'m sure you will get over it. 

- Please bear in mind this is my fist ever house mod (or any mod adding new areas for that matter), so forgive any crapness you might think to inform me of. 

- Most importantly, I made this for you. Enjoy!
author: TheGreyLight
